text: Modified Brice questionnaire 1. What is the last thing you remember before your surgery? 2. What is the first thing you remember after waking up? 3. Can you recall anything between under anaesthesia and waking up? 4. Did you dream anything during surgery? If so, was it disturbing? 5. What did you find most unpleasant about the surgery? 6. Did you have problems going to sleep or waking up?
